title.emphasis: Figure 7: Outline of genes in each group of the SynMuv pathway.

formalpara.para: SynMuv A and SynMuv B are the major groups in this pathway that are redundantly required for vulval development. The relationship of these pathways with the SynMuv C pathway are less clear. Within the SynMuv B group, LIN-53, marked with an asterisk, is listed twice, as it is found in both NuRD and DRM complexes.
